replies.bodyText:
@shrids bk version can be different from pravega version, so I am providing that separately.
desiredPravegaCMVersion I added so that if version map is not containing the desired pravega version in its config map, pravega-operator will discard that request. with this additional parameter, the desired pravega version can be added in operator's config map on the fly and it will support that pravega version then.
replies.author: Richa-Srivastava
